titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation signifying his Maiesties pleasure, that all men being in office of gouernment, at the decease of his most deare, and most royall father King Iames, shall so continue, till his Maiesties further direction.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: S. Iames, the eight and twentieth day of March, in the first yeere of his Maiesties reigne ..
Arms 11; Steele notation: call whom 2) proceedings most.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
